page.title: 15Edingale Village Hall
page.content: In the centre of the village of Edingale is the Village Hall. It is a modern building erected about 10 years ago to replace an older, smaller and less substantial hall. The original hall was situated on the corner of Croxall Road and Moorescroft. The new hall is near this site but further away from Croxall Road. The Village Hall is the general meeting place for many village organisations such as the Brownies and the Badminton Club.Discos, dances and concerts take place there and it is also available for hire for private functions. On one side of the hall there is a car park and on the west side there is a large grassed area used for recreation such as cricket and football.A childrens playground has been recently constructed.
